=========================
VS: T=97.8, BP=185/78, HR=88, RR=20, O2 sat 96% on RA  
WEIGHT: 76.6  
GENERAL: Well appearing in NAD. Appears younger than stated age.  
HEENT: NCAT. Sclera anicteric. EOMI. Conjunctiva were pink, no pallor or cyanosis of the oral mucosa.  
NECK: No appreciable JVD.  
CARDIAC: Regular rate and rhythm, S1/S2, systolic murmur best heard.
LUNGS: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no crackles, non-labored, symmetric chest expansion.
ABDOMEN: Soft, NTND. No HSM or tenderness.  
EXTREMITIES: No c/c/e. Warm and well perfused.
